Two limitations of hotspots
Two limitations of hotspots

generating or maintaining adaptive variation

2) may fail to take into account climatic change
2) may fail to take into account climatic change

SUMMARY 1) Gradients can be important drivers of
SUMMARY
1) Gradients can be important drivers of

adaptive genetic variation
adaptive genetic variation

2) Conserving gradients may offer a bet hedging approach for conserving adaptive variation in the face of climate change
2) Conserving gradients may offer a bet hedging
approach for conserving adaptive variation in
the face of climate change

3) Integrating biodiversity pattern, process and
3) Integrating biodiversity pattern, process and

degree of threat may offer a valuable approach for prioritizing regions for conservation

approach for prioritizing regions for
